definition: lit. as if having a fish bone stuck in one's throat (idiom)/fig. very upset and needing to express one's displeasure
to choke on a piece of food/(literary) a fish bone lodged in one's throat
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: Court on the racial discrimination and injustice such as the Cameron stuck in throat.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上的種族歧視和不公令卡梅隆如鯁在喉。

sentences.english: Race relations in the US continue to be a thorny problem.
sentences.chinese: 對於美國來說，一直以來，種族關係恰似如鯁在喉。
是什麼讓阿拉伯人如鯁在喉？
